project.name: J-C835A-CMUD-05-ST03-DT02-DF18-CF19-01
project.description: This test takes a string, and reads through the string, printing out each character with ASCII value greater than 48. If it encounters a character with ASCII value less than 48, it will fail to increment the loop counter, and loop forever.

iopair.name: J-C835A-CMUD-05-ST03-DT02-DF18-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: register a character, become an archon (essentially a superuser), destroy character Environment variable

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt

sleep 22 && screen -dmSL ${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']} "$SS_TC_DEPS/bin/tt++" "$SS_TC_ROOT/testData/good-01/good_01.tin"; while [[ `screen -ls` == *${SS_SCREEN_NAME//[$'\t\r\n ']}* ]]; do sleep 1; done;

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
kill $(ps aux | grep 'coffee_mud' | grep -v 'grep' | awk '{print $2}'); echo "Killed coffee_mud"; date

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01-01 AND GOOD-01-02 AND GOOD-01-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^(-|\.)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_g7BP80z1Hg0nPahX6s4n AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_jW8aaKt5E5 OR (NOT finished_uYPUK18ssO AND NOT (controlled_exit_dfRYgBR6wa OR continued_execution_x6zfWPcM24)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_jW8aaKt5E5 OR (NOT finished_uYPUK18ssO AND NOT (controlled_exit_dfRYgBR6wa OR continued_execution_x6zfWPcM24))) OR controlled_exit_dfRYgBR6wa)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_jW8aaKt5E5 OR (NOT finished_uYPUK18ssO AND NOT (controlled_exit_dfRYgBR6wa OR continued_execution_x6zfWPcM24)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_jW8aaKt5E5 OR (NOT finished_uYPUK18ssO AND NOT (controlled_exit_dfRYgBR6wa OR continued_execution_x6zfWPcM24))) OR controlled_exit_dfRYgBR6wa))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom count=1 bs=512 2> /dev/null | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 5 | head -1 >/tmp/screen_name.txt; cat /tmp/screen_name.txt
